Articles.Content: Hey guys if you didn't know KSP is now on the Geforce Experience supported game list Just saw it today. Cheers! Now just a driver update for sli! xD haha kidding. Silly unity limitations
Thats nice. Though I set most settings (AA, texture quality) not via game, but via NV control panel, because game choices are not plenty.
Probably won't have much impact beyond allowing better fine tuning of settings. It's largely what it's used for.

Does this effect it much mate?

Generally it's a tool used for people to get help with the fine tuning of settings, or people who just want everything sorted for them and want to get straight to the game!

It's a great too, AMD have their own version which is equally as good.
